title: Why is it important to know current events? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's important to know current events for a host of different reasonsIf you're a student it would help you in exams where they bring up case studiesIf you're looking for a job then a lot of jobs have group discussions and interviews where they discuss topics about current events When you're working at a corporate you need to socialise and the best way to do that and make contacts is through talking about current events If you're on vacation you may not know anything about this stranger from another country but if you know some current events you could talk about that It helps show people you are a well read and informed person and it could impress people and nd make them want to get to know you better

While many people here answer you ‘Why is it important to know current events?’ from the point of view of an average Indian citizen by saying current affairs is crucial to get a government job, I will leave it to them for answering with that perspective. Thereby I will provide you only with the logic behind learning current affairs.  One of the greatest catalysts for Human Beings’ success when compared to other animals/birds is that we live in thriving large,massive community. If you’re about to learn the daily happenings in this massive group of people, then the chances of your survival is pretty high. And also don’t mention less about the opportunities which you’ll acquire by being well informed about what’s happening around you. You’ll quite be the leader of the herd surrounding you.
